row.name: PCK.AUTOMIC_ATLASSIAN_JIRA.PUB.INCLUDE.ATTACH_RESOURCE
row.description: Attach the JIRA jar to current agent

row.Docu: This includes attaches the JIRA jar to current agent It can be used for both Windows and Unix environment

row.process:
:ATTACH_RES "PCK.AUTOMIC_ATLASSIAN_JIRA.PRV.STORE" ,"ATLASSIANJIRATOOL", C, N
! Setting jar class path into variable :SET &UC4RB_JIRA_PATH_JAR#= STR_CAT(&$AGENT_RESOURCES_CLIENT#,"atlassianjira-tool.jar")
